description: Updates a user's current mailbox quota for a specified organization and user.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization that contains the user for whom to update the mailbox quota.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The identifer for the user for whom to update the mailbox quota. The identifier can be the UserId, Username, or email. The following identity formats are available: User ID: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: user@domain.tld User name: user.

parameters.name: MailboxQuota
parameters.description: The updated mailbox quota, in MB, for the specified user.
